argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sspmaplub.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 2 |  | sspmaplub.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 3 |  | sspmaplub.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( _|_P ` K ) = ( _|_P ` K ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_2polssN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ A ) -> S C_ ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` S ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_2polvalN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ A ) -> ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` S ) ) = ( M ` ( U ` S ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sseqtrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ A ) -> S C_ ( M ` ( U ` S ) ) ) |
